name: GetCustomerTaxIds
description:
Retrieve a customer's tax IDs from their profile.

Call this tool to get a list of all tax IDs associated with a specific customer. It gathers the tax identification numbers stored in a customer's account on Stripe.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer for whom the tax IDs are being retrieved. This is a required field.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor object ID to fetch the previous page in a paginated list. Use the ID from the starting object of the current list.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: expand_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields in the response that should be expanded. Provide field names as strings.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: max_number_of_tax_ids
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of tax IDs to return. Accepts an integer between 1 and 100, with a default value of 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after
parameters.description: An object ID from the current list to continue fetching the next page in pagination.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.
